parameters.query:
WITH product_stock AS (
  SELECT 
    p.id,
    p.name,
    p.brand,
    COUNT(i.id) as stock_count,
    AVG(i.purchase_cost) as avg_cost
  FROM products.products p
  LEFT JOIN inventory.inventory_items i ON p.id = i.product_id AND i.status = 'available'
  GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.brand
  HAVING COUNT(i.id) > 0 AND COUNT(i.id) < 3
),
recent_sales AS (
  SELECT 
    product_id,
    COUNT(*) as sales_last_30_days
  FROM transactions.orders
  WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
    AND status IN ('completed', 'shipped')
  GROUP BY product_id
)
SELECT 
  ps.*,
  COALESCE(rs.sales_last_30_days, 0) as recent_sales
FROM product_stock ps
LEFT JOIN recent_sales rs ON ps.id = rs.product_id
WHERE COALESCE(rs.sales_last_30_days, 0) > 2
ORDER BY recent_sales DESC, stock_count ASC
LIMIT 20
